testcase.classname: Customer spend limit request and approval by BAM
testcase.name: Customer spend limit request and approval by BAM:[OrderApproval]
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager[UserInformation]........passed Then I update the customer spend limit......................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Finance Manager.........................passed Then I approve the customer spend limit.....................................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed Given I launch the application as a Partner Manager.........................passed Then I verify that the customer spend limit is updated......................passed Then I logout from the application..........................................passed
